name: Easter Bunny on speed
description:
The controls are:
A for going left
D for going right
Space for jumping

IMPORTANT: The sound is not good in the browser. But works flawless when you download the game

This game is made for Godot Wild Jam: 31:  https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-31

Source code is done Jonas Majlund Vejlin and is under GPL license

Sound effect and artwork is done by Kenny ( https://kenney.itch.io/) and is under Creative Commons Zero, CC0
